ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the fact find requirements field is selected before a piece of advice can be moved out of set up
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c ,"Setup")) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c ,"Cancelled")) && ISPICKVAL(Fact_find_requirements__c, "") && (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Advice_RT_General_Advice' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DB_Advice' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to add the Fact find requirements
